snippet: A Maine man insisted he is not a violent person, as he was sentenced Friday to seven years in prison for shaking his 6-month-old daughter so forcefully it left her brain damaged, a quadriplegic and unable to see or hear....

headline.print_headline: Maine Father Who Shook Baby Gets 7 Years in Prison
headline.main: Maine Father Who Shook Baby Gets 7 Years in Prison

lead_paragraph: A Maine man insisted he is not a violent person, as he was sentenced Friday to seven years in prison for shaking his 6-month-old daughter so forcefully it left her brain damaged, a quadriplegic and unable to see or hear.
